forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 56F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly this evening. Low 8C. WSW winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly this evening. Low 48F. WSW winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers and thundershowers in the evening, then cloudy with rain likely later at night. Low 11C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers, a few thundershowers and gusty winds during the evening will give way to steady rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
